wikipedia_page.main: Robbie Jay Montgomery (born 22 September 1994) is an English cricketer who played for Gloucestershire County Cricket Club. Primarily a right arm fast-medium bowler, he also bats right-handed.  He was released by Gloucestershire at the end of the 2015 season, without having played any first-class cricket that summer due to ongoing lower back troubles.

response: Robbie Montgomery (born June 16, 1940) is an American soul singer and restaurateur. She is noted for being one of the original Ikettes in the Ike & Tina Turner Revue in the 1960s. After her tenure as an Ikette, she was a member of the Mirettes, and then became a "Night Tripper" for Dr. John. In the 1970s, Montgomery was a backing vocalist for acts such as Stevie Wonder, Barbra Streisand, the Rolling Stones, and Joe Cocker. She later created the Sweetie Pie's franchise, and starred in the award-winning reality series Welcome to Sweetie Pie's.
